verbs.description: If [ARG1: President Trump] [V: is] [ARG2: to maximize the value of his time in office] , he needs as many staffers in the government who share his policy views as possible .
If [ARG0: President Trump] is to [V: maximize] [ARG1: the value of his time in office] , he needs as many staffers in the government who share his policy views as possible .
[ARGM-ADV: If President Trump is to maximize the value of his time in office] , [ARG0: he] [V: needs] [ARG1: as many staffers in the government who share his policy views as possible] .
If President Trump is to maximize the value of his time in office , he needs [ARG0: as many staffers in the government] [R-ARG0: who] [V: share] [ARG1: his policy views] as possible .
